messages.content: I disagree with many picks in this list

i disagree with that, you cant say everyone in the country does that, you dont know every [NAME] and their entire life stories stories

Some Leftist ideologies frown upon SocDems as counterrevolutionary. Don’t agree with it, but that’s the thought process.
Nah I dont think the panthers are good enough
I believe it was clear I disagreed. And I don’t play wow.
I don't date women who smoke. As for pills or syringes etc, I don't find recreational drug users attractive. Similarly for being drunk.
Every other way sounds wrong. SPR for life.
